pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, January 24, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Quispamsis, New Brunswick  

9:40 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit with families at the Origins Natural Learning Childcare Centre to highlight the Canada Child Benefit.

Origins Natural Learning Childcare Centre
4 Landing Court                

Notes for media:

    • Photo opportunity
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 9:10 a.m.

Miramichi, New Brunswick 

7:00 p.m The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall Q&A.

James M. Hill High School
128 Henderson Street

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media requiring parking for satellite trucks should contact media@pmo-cpm.gc.ca.
    • Media requiring advance set-up will have site access as of 5:00 p.m. All media should arrive no later than 6:30 p.m.
